alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 10:47AM CST until February 25 at 9:25AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Coldwater River near Sarah For the Coldwater River...including Sarah...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Coldwater River near Sarah. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Extensive flooding is occurring near Marks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
